remarks: Rewriting a disjoint collection into a partition of its image set (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Dec-2016.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Mar-2017.)
statement:
disjabrexf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
disjabrexf $p |- ( Disj_ x e. A B -> Disj_ y e. { z | E. x e. A z = B } y ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d x y z $.
